targets.query: SELECT mean("packets_received") FROM "ping" WHERE ("host"::tag = 'thor') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'thor') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'loki') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'marvel') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'hulk') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'hulkbuster') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)

SELECT last("data") AS "last_data"
FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."syslog"
WHERE $timeFilter AND "path"='/var/log/syslog' AND "host"='thor' AND "data" =~ /.*error|ERROR.*/
GROUP BY time(10m), last_data FILL(null)
SELECT mean("err_out") AS "mean_err_out" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."net" WHERE  ( "host"='KIVI-NEW24') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(null)
SELECT mean("err_out") AS "mean_err_out" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."net" WHERE  ( "host"='blade') GROUP BY time(10m) FILL(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 10s) FROM "net" WHERE ("host"::tag = 'groot' AND "interface"::tag = 'bond0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
